EmailTemplate.name: 2 Weeks Before PickUp Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Legend Boats - The Water is Calling
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.FirstName},
The time for you to pick up your new boat is fast approaching! We are so excited for you to join our Legend family. To ensure the pick-up of your new boat package goes as smoothly as possible, please remember the following items on your pick up date:
2 Inch Trailer Ball - Install 18" - 20" from the ground Flat 4-Pin Wiring Harness (For a trailer without brakes) Flat 5-Pin Wiring Harness (For a trailer with brakes) Your Pleasure Craft Operators Card Final Payment, If Applicable (Cash, Certified Cheque or Bank Draft)
Please arrive a few minutes early to allow time to get acquainted and allow approximately 1 - 2 hours for your new boat orientation.
If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me.
Once again, welcome to the Legend Family and we look forward to seeing you!
Sincerely,
{!User.Name} {!User.Title}
{!User.Email} {!User.Phone} legendboats.com
